vfbr
  • Reference

Reference version 0.3

Package Help

Provides an overview of key functions and classes

vfbr-package

Programmatic Access to the virtualflybrain.org website

Queries

Programmatic queries of VFB data

vfb_autocomplete_query

Replicate the VFB site's autocomplete query

vfb_neo4j_query

Query VFB's Neo4J graph database

vfb_owl_query

Generic query against VFB OWL API

vfb_solr_query

Query VFB via solr indexing system

vfb_synonym_query

Find canononical ontology term using VFB SOLR to query synonyms

Image Data

download_gmr_stacks

Download the registered GMR stacks for given ids

gmr_stack_urls gmr_stack_urls_for_ids

Return the urls for GMR-Gal4 stacks

vfb_3dbrowser_url

Make a URL for a set of VFB ids to be displayed in the 3D browser

vfb_stack_url

Make a URL for a set of VFB ids to be displayed in the stack browser

NBLAST neuron search

vfb_nblast

Query vfb opencpu server to obtain pre-computed nblast scores

Identifiers

gmr_vfbid

Convert GMR identifiers to VFB ids

vfb_fromvfbids vfb_tovfbids

Convert between VFB and external identifiers
